# HW 1

## 2b

```{r, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r simulation}
X_i <- rnorm(10000, 0, 5)

e_i <- rnorm(10000, 0, 1)

Y_i0 <- 2 * X_i + e_i

Y_i1 <- Y_i0 - 1

p_i <- 1 / (1 + exp(-X_i))

W_i <- rbinom(10000, 1, p_i)

Y_i <- W_i * Y_i1 + (1 - W_i) * Y_i0
```

```{r plot}
df <- data.frame(
  X = X_i,
  Y = Y_i,
  W = W_i
)

df |>
  ggplot(df, x = X, y = Y, color = factor (W)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) + 
  labs(x = "X (Covaritate)", y = "Observed Outcome Y", color = "Treatment") +
  theme_minimal()

ggsave("plot1.pdf", width = 7, height = 5)

```
